video.title: Unsealed: Conspiracy Files
video.synopsis: Investigate top-secret files, recently made accessible by the Freedom on Information Act, that explore new evidence of incredible conspiracies.

episodes.synopsis: Prophecies concerning the end of days for humanity have existed for centuries. But what happens if one actually comes true?
episodes.title: Doomsday

episodes.synopsis: A secret government facility is suspected of being able to create diseases, as well as unleash them on the innocent public.
episodes.title: Bio-Hazard Island

episodes.synopsis: No matter where you go and what you watch, someone is trying to control how you think. What are some of the new methods of mind manipulation?
episodes.title: Mind Control

episodes.synopsis: There are many theories about a small group of influential people who control the fate of the planet, but who are these people and how do they do it?
episodes.title: New World Order

episodes.synopsis: As zombies become a science-fiction fad, the focus has shifted to whether the living dead could become a reality.
episodes.title: Zombies

episodes.synopsis: New technologies can be exciting, but also used for evil. Is weather control being used by world governments to incite a new global war?
episodes.title: HAARP

episodes.synopsis: Secret animal cloning experiments suggest that human cloning may be done in the not-too-distant future.
episodes.title: Cloning

episodes.synopsis: The half-man, half-ape has been sighted many times over the years in various locations. Is the hairy humanoid a myth or a beast being hidden from us?
episodes.title: Bigfoot

episodes.synopsis: The concept of an Antichrist is shared by many religions and cultures, but how will we stop this evil entity?
episodes.title: Who Is the Anti-Christ?

episodes.synopsis: As we rely increasingly on machines in our everyday lives, at what point will the balance of power shift in their favor?
episodes.title: Rise of the Machines

episodes.synopsis: World governments may know the location of stargates, portals to wormholes in time and space. Where are these gateways?
episodes.title: Stargate Portals

episodes.synopsis: Some of the most famous conspiracies of all time are examined, along with a few lesser-known shocking tales.
episodes.title: Top 10 Conspiracies of All Time

episodes.synopsis: Documents about a CIA operation could show that the American government is closely watching its citizens' every move.
episodes.title: Remote Viewing

episodes.synopsis: Some of the world's most notorious leaders protect themselves with body doubles. So how do you know when someone like Hitler really dies?
episodes.title: Fake World Leaders

episodes.synopsis: Evidence exists that the U.S. military has been involved in a secret battle with alien forces for at least 50 years.
episodes.title: America's Alien Wars

episodes.synopsis: Evidence suggests that time travel isn't just a dream of the future: It may have been going on for years.
episodes.title: Time Travel

episodes.synopsis: There are persistent rumors that key members of the Nazi inner circle -- including Hitler -- escaped their assumed fate after World War II.
episodes.title: Nazis Today

episodes.synopsis: With the amount of money and resources being spent on defense and other projects in space, are world governments preparing for an alien attack?
episodes.title: Secret Alien Attack

episodes.synopsis: Get an inside look at 10 powerful and mysterious organizations that could be planning the world's fate.
episodes.title: Top 10 Secret Societies

episodes.synopsis: Fort Knox and Hangar 18 in Dayton, Ohio, are among the facilities that could be harboring secrets the government wants to keep from becoming public.
episodes.title: Secret Government Warehouses

episodes.synopsis: Pandemics, famine and natural disasters are among the global events that could cause humankind's extinction.
episodes.title: Global Depopulation

episodes.synopsis: The United States military has developed incredible technology that can be used to conquer this world and perhaps others.
episodes.title: America's Flying Saucer
